sentences.en: boots caked with mud
sentences.cn: 沾满泥巴的靴子

sentences.en: By the end of the game, all the kids were covered in mud.
sentences.cn: 到了比赛快结束的时候，所有的孩子都浑身是泥。

sentences.en: Despite the mud outside, the earthen floor was clean.
sentences.cn: 尽管外面泥泞，屋内的泥土地面还是很干净。

sentences.en: Dogs love splashing in mud and hippos wallow in it.
sentences.cn: 狗喜欢在泥水洼里扑腾，河马则喜欢在其中打滚撒欢儿。

sentences.en: Her dress was spattered with mud.
sentences.cn: 她的裙子溅上了泥浆。

sentences.en: His clothing was stained with mud.
sentences.cn: 他的衣服沾上了泥。

sentences.en: His legs were caked with dried mud.
sentences.cn: 他腿上结着干泥巴。

sentences.en: I dirty my trousers when I step on the mud.
sentences.cn: 我一脚擩在烂泥里， 把裤子弄脏了。

sentences.en: if you forget their birthdays your name is mud.
sentences.cn: 如果你忘记了他们的生日，那就够你受的了。

sentences.en: It was impossible to move the car – its wheels had got stuck in the mud.
sentences.cn: 这车子动不了——车轮陷到烂泥里了。

sentences.en: Latest reports say that mud slides buried entire villages.
sentences.cn: 最新报道说泥石流掩埋了整个整个的村庄。

sentences.en: Many villages in Mali consist of mud huts.
sentences.cn: 马里的大多数村庄都是泥草房。

sentences.en: My hands, boots and trousers were plastered with mud.
sentences.cn: 我的双手、靴子和裤子上都沾满了泥巴。

sentences.en: The camel's feet, well adapted for dry sand, are useless on mud.
sentences.cn: 骆驼的蹄子虽然非常适合于在干沙上行走，碰到泥泞时却无计可施。

sentences.en: The Mud Bath is particularly recommended for relieving tension and stiff muscles.
sentences.cn: 特别推荐想要放松情绪、缓解肌肉酸痛的人泡泥浆浴。

sentences.en: The mud is a feeding ground for large numbers of birds.
sentences.cn: 大批鸟儿来这块泥地觅食。

sentences.en: The mud is smooth, gray, soft, and plastic as butter.
sentences.cn: 这种泥浆呈灰色，它光滑、柔软，像黄油一样易塑。

sentences.en: The path beside the river was slippery with mud.
sentences.cn: 河边的小路泥泞湿滑。

sentences.en: The salt marshes and mud flats attract large numbers of waterfowl.
sentences.cn: 盐碱地和泥滩吸引了大量水鸟。

sentences.en: The two girls joined arms and sloshed through the mud together.
sentences.cn: 两个女孩挽着胳膊，一道趟过了泥浆。

sentences.en: They daubed mud all over themselves.
sentences.cn: 他们用泥涂满全身。

sentences.en: They had to battle through thick mud to reach construction workers.
sentences.cn: 他们只好挣扎着穿过厚厚的泥巴去找建筑工人。

sentences.en: We slogged through the mud of an early spring thaw.
sentences.cn: 我们在初春解冻时节的泥泞中艰难行进。

words.tran_cn: 使污浊；使沾上泥；把…弄糊涂

phrases.tran_cn: 泥浆循环系统；泥浆系统
(非正式)某人名声扫地了；某人失宠倒霉了

trans.tran_cn: 泥，泥淖，没价值的东西，污物，<美俚>咖啡，诽谤的话
trans.tran_en: wet earth that has become soft and sticky
wet earth that has become soft and sticky
